formulas.name: day_before_email_copy
formulas.expression: IF( ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Menti__c}, "Approved"), "Just a reminder that we will be using Mentimeter live polling in portions of our Assembly, if you can please remind students to bring their phones." & BR() & "Please ensure all teachers have the schedule for the day, and of course, let me know if you have any questions!", IF( ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Menti__c}, "Declined - Using Form"), "As a reminder, here is the student poll that you can share with teachers (if you haven't yet) in advance of the presentation: " & {!$Record.LD_com_redirection_link__c}, "If you have any questions before they arrive, please let me know" ) )

formulas.name: Pre_student_survey_link
formulas.expression:
IF( ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Menti__c}, "Declined - Using Form"), "

Here is a link to survey you can send to students in advance. We use their answers as part of the assembly: " & {!$Record.LD_com_redirection_link__c} & "

", "" )

Flow.label: Circles Assemblies: In-Person Pre/Post Emails + Survey

start.filterLogic: 6 OR (1 and 2 and (3 or 5 or 8) and 4 and 7)

scheduledPaths.name: X1_day_before_Panel_warning_preview
scheduledPaths.label: 1 day before 7 day Panel warning preview

textTemplates.name: one_day_before_w_menti
textTemplates.text:
Hi {!$Record.Contact_Survey__r.FirstName},

I’m so excited that LiveDifferent will be at {!school_name} on {!day_of_week}. {!day_before_email_copy}

Warm regards,
{!$Record.Owner.FirstName}
{!$Record.Owner.MobilePhone}

P.S. Here is an informational resource that you may wish to share with your school community: LiveDifferent Resource

textTemplates.name: student_panel_warning
textTemplates.text:
Hello {!$Record.Contact_Survey__r.FirstName},

I hope everything is going smoothly as you prepare for the upcoming LiveDifferent assembly. This is a friendly reminder that student panel video submissions are due by {!four_days_before}.

If we don't receive the videos by {!four_days_before}, we won't be able to include the student panel in the assembly due to the time needed for video editing.

Reminder on how to create your Student Panel:

  1. Nominate 3 students for the panel question.
  2. Share this PDF, "Student Panel Instructions.pdf," with each student.
  3. Pick a date & time to meet with the three students to record and submit their video by clicking on the VideoAsk link >>HERE<<. (This link also has a guide with instructions).

Thank you for your attention to this. We're excited to see what your students will share!

Best regards,

{!$Record.Owner.FirstName}

textTemplates.name: survey_email
textTemplates.text:
Hi {!$Record.Contact_Survey__r.FirstName},

Thank you so much for having us at your school today! I will reach out in the next day or two (or book the time that works best for you here) to hear more about how things went, but I wanted to get these links over to you quickly:

  1. Survey for you, as our main contact (we'd love it if you share this link with other staff as well).
  2. Survey for all students.
  3. Here is the link that students can use to take action on what they heard in the presentation: http://livedifferent.com/next.

We greatly appreciate you taking the time to share your feedback, and for sharing these links with your school community, as hearing feedback directly from students and staff is crucial to the improvement of our youth empowerment programs.

Best Regards,

{!$Record.Owner.FirstName}

textTemplates.name: teacher_recognition_form_email
textTemplates.text:
Hello {!$Record.Contact_Survey__r.FirstName},

I hope everything is going smoothly as you prepare for the upcoming LiveDifferent assembly. As part of our upcoming presentation on {!$Record.Invoice_Date_Text__c}, we have a segment where we'd like to acknowledge and honour a teacher/staff member. To help us achieve this, we ask your help with the following:

  • Please nominate a group of 3 students that will nominate a staff and each share one thought
  • Have them meet for a few minutes and fill out this form together!

Thank you for your attention to this. We're excited to see what your students will share!

Best regards,

{!$Record.Owner.FirstName}

textTemplates.name: three_words_survey_form
textTemplates.text:
Hi {!$Record.Contact_Survey__r.FirstName},

Since cell phones will not be used during the Assembly, I’ve created a form for students to answer the question we would have asked live. The responses will remain anonymous, and we'll display the collective answers in a word cloud during the event.

Could you please forward the following link to the teachers so they can share it with their students?: {!$Record.LD_com_redirection_link__c}

Thanks so much,

{!$Record.Owner.FirstName} {!$Record.Owner.LastName}
